page.title: 07SHOPS AND TRADE
page.content: The meeting of the Antrim, Ballyclare, Carnmoney and Hightown Roads has for many years been a meeting place and has developed therefore as the shopping and commercial centre. { SHOPPING SURVEY} 1. Shoe Shop 3 11. Garage 2 2. Bank 4 12. Clothing 13 3. Cafe 5 13. Electrical 5 4. Furniture 2 14. Hardware 9 5. Bakery 3 15. Estate Agents 8 6. Supermarket 3 16. Building 7. Flower Shop 3 Societies 4 8. Fruit Shop 1 17. Travel Agents 2 9. Sweet Shop 7 18. Butchers 4 10.Chemist 3 19. Hairdressers 7 Survey carried out in centre of Glengormley. This small triangle serves a very large residential area and high family population. It also employs several hundred local people.
